transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir, aap IndiaMART mein.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji, haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan ji sir boliye sir, kya bataiye sir.
Customer: Sir mere ko kuch nahi hai, itna thoda sa pata kya kuch cheez mein na pata karna tha na.
Executive: Ji ji bataiye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sun raha hu bataiye. Sir jaise ab na.
Customer: Sir jaise mere paas lead aati hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To uska jo data hota hai usko agar import karte hai hum log to wo kis mein aata hai sir ye?
Executive: To fir se ek bar bataiye sir kya puch rahe hai aap?
Customer: Jo inquiries vagera aati hai na hamare paas sir na.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Unki contact detail vagera ke liye haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Aap Fox India Industries service ke liye call kiya. Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji. Bilkul bilkul sir bilkul. Aapka kya naam hai sir?
Customer: Himanshu Pandey naam hai sir.
Executive: Achcha Himanshu ji. Achcha achcha. Himanshu ji lead manager pe hi saari details aapko dikhte hai.
Customer: Nahi sir jaise ki maan lo mujhe kisi particular day ka agar mujhe data chahiye na ki how many calls hai main bata deti. Calls aur inquiry hoti hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Agar aapko pura performance month wise dekhna hai to aap dashboard pe click kariye left hand side pe.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Dashboard pe click kar denge aap niche scroll down karenge. Waha pe performance report card dikhega aapko.
Customer: Thik hai. Nahi sir jaise particular kisi day ka mere ko agar chahiye ho na. To suppose karo ki mere paas aapko sir pura data chahiye ki within main do option batata hu. Ek hai ki aap pure weekly wise monthly wise ye dekhna chahte hai ki kitni call se inquiries aapke paas aayi hai ya ki particular data ka contact detail ya number dekhna chahte hai aap?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji wahi chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Achcha to aap ek bar lead manager pe click kariye.
Customer: Thik hai sir kar diya maine.
Executive: Waha click karke aap dekhenge upar apne filter ka option aa raha hai sir aapke paas. Chota sa reminder ke upar filter bana hua hai.
Customer: Bilkul sir.
Executive: Haan filter pe aap click karenge na to aap dekhenge waha pe filter pe sare options hai ki aap sabse pehle location ka option aayega location pe India pe kar le aap ya to kisi agar specific location ka dekhna chahte hai to wo city aap select kar sakte hai.
Customer: Filter pe option aa raha hai. Isme aa raha hai na activity by date?
Executive: Nahi sir aapne jaise lead manager pe click kiya. Haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji ye aa gaya. Haan ji aa gaya filter aa gaya na sir.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Filters ke baad location ho gaya chalo thik hai. Filter mein pehla filter hai jaise hamare location ka filter aap laga sakte hai ki kis particular location se chahiye aap all over India kar denge to puri India ke lead dikhegi.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Niche source hai. Source mein sir agar direct ka matlab hota hai jo direct inquiries aapke paas aayi hai aur by lead ka option hota hai jo leads humne consume kiya hai. All pe karenge to dono aa jayega hamare paas.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To all pe click karke niche aap ek hamare paas option hota hai date select time duration select karne ka.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Waha pe aap click karenge to waha pe sir aapke paas option aayega ki aap kisi bhi particular year ka ya date time weekly wise select kar sakte hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Waha pe click karke niche aap agar kisi specific category ka janna chahte hai ya product ka janna chahte hai wo dal de. Otherwise niche apply pe click kar denge to sare data aa jayenge sir aapke paas.
Customer: Ek second sir.
Customer: Aur mere ko isko agar import export ya import aise kuch karna hai to sir?
Executive: Uske liye sir agar aapke paas CRM hai na to CRM ke through aap kar sakte hai.
Customer: CRM to maine filhal band kar diya sir apna hai na.
Executive: Achcha to sir waise to nahi hoga but agar aapke paas CRM hai to hum aapko API key provide kar denge aap directly kar sakte hai.
Customer: Date ki sheet agar particular kisi date ka chahiye mere ko to sir isme. To waha pe date aa raha hai na sir aap yearly wise ya to check kar lijiye. Year dal ke ya date dal ke.
Customer: Okay. Haan.
Customer: Thik hai sir thik hai thik hai thik hai thik thik thik. Ji ji.
Customer: Aur koi issue to nahi aa raha sir?
Executive: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know how to import data.

- Wants data of a particular day.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to check performance report.

- Explained how to use filters in lead manager.

- Informed about CRM and API key.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, data, filter, crm, api
